name: Asian Tacos
preparation: In a bowl, stir together mayo, aioli mix, and lemon juice, if desired. Set aside.
In Multipurpose Steamer, combine meat with seasoning . Cover; microwave on high until meat is cooked through, 3−5 min.
Meanwhile, thinly slice green onion. Using a Y-peeler, make cucumber ribbons.
Spoon meat mixture into taco shells. Top with veggies and a dollop of aioli.
tips: Make it vegetarian by replacing chicken with 1 lb (450 g) cubed firm organic tofu.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced mixed vegetables, your choice.

products.name: Chipotle Aioli Mix
summary: Medium-spicy Southwestern flavor with noteworthy chipotle chili and smoked paprika. A crowd-pleasing condiment for your burgers, fries, fish tacos, burritos and anything else that needs a little extra kick.

products.name: Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning
summary: Your go-to for stir-fries, sautéed vegetables or add as a seasoning to any rice and noodle dish.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
